text: REDO PHASE To redo an action: » Reapply logged action. > Set to log record's LSN. > No additional logging, no forced flushes! At the end of Redo Phase, write log records for all txns with status C and remove them from the ATT. | szom08 i " = = 4 » PI o) 1:0330/1:18:06 - ANALYSIS PHASE EXAMPLE > 8 £ I e - 21 - ARIES Database Recovery (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
